headline: 'We Must Win Back Our Future'—Nearly 400 Millionaires And Billionaires Urge Leaders At Davos To Tax The 'Super Rich'
summary: An international group of nearly 400 millionaires and billionaires is calling on world leaders at the Davos summit in Switzerland to take action against rising inequality—starting with taxing people like themselves.
